text: Cun Alloh onhoro az ʙahr nacot dod, ʙini, ki dar zamin ʙa nohaq sarkasi kunand ʙa suji gunoh va fasodkori dar zamin ʙarmegardand. Ej mardum, in sarkasi ʙa zijoni xudaton ast. Manfiat meʙared dar in zindagii dunjavi. On goh hama ʙa nazdi Mo ʙozmegarded, to az korhoe, ki mekarded, ogohaton sozem
